attributes.action: Send the UK into a full national lockdown to battle covid instead of tiers
attributes.additional_details: Cases are rising by the day and the tier system isn’t helping. There will be consequences regardless of what happens, we need to minimise damage and send us into a full lockdown. It’s our best option
attributes.background: Abolish the tier system for the time being and send the UK into a full lockdown like last year, schooling online and minimal workers leaving their homes
